headline: Did Southern’s US$4 Billion Grid Investment Just Shift Southern's (SO) Investment Narrative?
summary: Southern recently settled the Georgia All-Source Request for Proposals, a move expected to add about US$4.00 billion to its capital spending commitments. This sizable increase in planned investment raises important questions about how Southern balances growth opportunities with funding needs and potential pressure on earnings over time. We’ll now explore how this added US$4.00 billion capital burden could influence Southern’s investment narrative and investors’ assessment of future...

headline: Georgia Power receives turbine and generator for new Unit 9 at Plant Yates
summary: Progress continues on new natural gas generation units at Plant Yates in Coweta County, Georgia, located about an hour southwest of Atlanta. Georgia Power recently received delivery of the latest major components – including the turbine and generator – to complete the new Unit 9 combustion turbine (CT). Each new Plant Yates CT includes a state-of-the-art Mitsubishi Power M501JAC simple-cycle gas combustion turbine and a Mitsubishi Electric Power VP-X Series turbine generator. Assembled at Mitsub
